Text: The Agency has now developed and validated the first ever National Disaster Response Plan (2019-30) and, working with partners, provided seeds to 10,719 farmers across the country in preparation for the 2019 rainy season.
Cause: The Agency has now developed and validated the first ever National Disaster Response Plan (2019-30) and, working with partners
Effect: provided seeds to 10,719 farmers across the country in preparation for the 2019 rainy season.
Sentence: <e1>The Agency has now developed and validated the first ever National Disaster Response Plan (2019-30) and, working with partners</e1>, <e2>provided seeds to 10,719 farmers across the country in preparation for the 2019 rainy season.</e2>
